外贸综合词汇 ... product development 产品开发；产品研究发展 product diversification 产品多元化 product innovation 产品创新.
3.产品多样化(Product Diversification)。一国如果产品多样化程度较高,则其出口不同产品的范围也就较广。一般来说,经济事件通常不会同时对所有产品的生产和出口产生不.

entry.tran: 增加…的品种;从事多种经营;（使）多样化
entry.def: When an organization or person diversifies into other things, or diversifies their range of something, they increase the variety of things that they do or make.

example.ex: The company's troubles started only when it diversified into new products...
example.tran: 当公司增加新产品时，麻烦才开始的。

example.ex: Manufacturers have been encouraged to diversify...
example.tran: 制造商们被鼓励要做到产品多样化。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of introducing variety (especially in investments or in the variety of goods and services offered);

sentences.sentence: "my broker recommended a greater diversification of my investments"
"he limited his losses by diversification of his product line"
"that restaurant's menu lacks diversification; every day it is the same"
